description: This file defines data models and API interaction logic for retrieving contacts in a video calling app frontend. It includes a Contact data class and a ContactsApi class that fetches contact data, supporting mock data mode.

classes.name: Contact
classes.description: Data model representing a contact with an ID and name.

classes.name: ContactsApi
classes.description: API class for fetching contact data, supporting mock mode and real API calls.

methods.name: fetchContacts
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches a list of contacts, returning mocked data if in mock mode.
